https://tmrev.io/movie/588211-Alien: Ore 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zS6vvoRgy3v4FR0diWPydYanzvJ.jpg As a hard-working miner of a planet mining colony, Lorraine longs to make a better life for her daughter and grandchildren. When her shift uncovers the death of a fellow miner under mysterious circumstances, Lorraine is forced to choose between escape or defying management orders and facing her fears to fight for the safety of her family. Alien: Ore is one of six short films produced to celebrate the 40th anniversary of 1979's Alien. Alien: Ore
